description: You'll want to pull out the slow cooker for this delicious dinner. Rich and spicy, this lamb shank rogan josh will become a family favourite dish in no time.
name: Slow Cooker Lamb Rogan Josh Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer shanks to a dish. Remove and discard cardamom from sauce. Spoon sauce over shanks. Top with cucumber and extra mint. Serve with yoghurt mixture and pappadums.
